results.definition: a person authorized to conduct religious worship
examples: clergymen are usually called ministers in Protestant churches

results.definition: a diplomat representing one government to another; ranks below ambassador
a person appointed to a high office in the government
attend to the wants and needs of others
examples: I have to minister to my mother all the time

results.definition: the job of a head of a government department
inRegion: united kingdom of great britain and northern ireland

examples: She is ministering in an old parish
